articles.title: New Species of Jurassic Herbivorous Dinosaur Discovered in China - Sci.News
articles.description: A new genus and species of eusauropod dinosaur has been identified from a fossilized partial skeleton with a nearly complete skull found in the Chinese province of Gansu.
